.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.2.0 (2015-08-10)
++++++++++++++++++

* Added ``is_gift`` and ``has_gift_message`` to `order` input dictionary
  validation.
* Request keys with ``None`` values are no longer validated or sent to the
  web service.

0.1.0 (2015-06-29)
++++++++++++++++++

* First beta release.

0.0.1 (2015-06-19)
++++++++++++++++++

* Initial release.
